category.name: LDAP
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: LDAP_member_type_attr
preference.preference_description: Defines the LDAP group object attribute that contains the membership type (direct or indirect) for this object. Valid values: TRUE - Specifies indirect group membership. If this setting is used, the LDAP_member_list_attr preference must also be set. FALSE - Specifies direct group membership.
